what: Assign reaction conditions to students — assignReactions
title: Assign reaction conditions to students — assignReactions
text: Randomly assigns student one substrate one inhibition type (excluding "no_inhibition"), creates paired condition "no_inhibition". student therefore two rows: one inhibited one uninhibited reaction. function writes metadata Excel file timestamped assignments_output folder.

title: Assign reaction conditions to students — assignReactions
code: assignReactions(   student_file = NULL,   enzyme_file = NULL,   project_path = ".",   seed = 1234,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Assign reaction conditions to students — assignReactions
text: student_file Optional path Excel file containing student list columns student_no, first_name, surname. enzyme_file Optional path Excel file containing enzyme parameters (e.g. reaction_parameters.xlsx). project_path Path top-level project folder created initialiseProject(). Default current working directory. seed Random seed reproducibility (default = 1234). verbose Logical; TRUE (default), prints progress messages.

what: Generate answer PDFs from assignment Excel files — generateAnswers
title: Generate answer PDFs from assignment Excel files — generateAnswers
text: Reads student assignment files, estimates rates (optionally) Km/Vmax, renders per-student answer pages : Absorbance vs time (faceted rxn_condition) Michaelis-Menten (conditions one plot; optional nls fit) Lineweaver-Burke (conditions one plot; fitted lm lines)

title: Generate answer PDFs from assignment Excel files — generateAnswers
code: generateAnswers(   run_timestamp,   output_files = c("single", "separate", "both"),   project_path = ".",   verbose = TRUE )

title: Generate answer PDFs from assignment Excel files — generateAnswers
text: run_timestamp Timestamp string (YYYY-MM-DD_HHMM) assignReactions(). output_files One "separate", "single", "". Default "single". project_path Path top-level project folder (default "."). verbose Logical; show progress messages (default TRUE).

title: Generate answer PDFs from assignment Excel files — generateAnswers

what: Generate assignment Excel files for each student — generateAssignments
title: Generate assignment Excel files for each student — generateAssignments
text: Reads setup metadata (assignReactions()) produces per-student Excel files simulated absorbance vs. time data. student receives inhibited uninhibited conditions one sheet. true inhibition type remains instructor metadata.

title: Generate assignment Excel files for each student — generateAssignments
code: generateAssignments(   run_timestamp,   project_path = ".",   verbose = TRUE,   cuv_vol = 0.003,   eps = 6220,   enz_vol = 0.1,   substr_conc = c(0, 10, 20, 40, 80, 160),   time_vec = c(0.17, 0.33, 0.5, 0.66, 0.83, 1),   use_jitter = TRUE,   jitter_sd = 0.02 )

title: Generate assignment Excel files for each student — generateAssignments
text: run_timestamp Timestamp string (YYYY-MM-DD_HHMM) assignReactions(). project_path Path top-level project folder (default "."). verbose Logical; show progress messages (default TRUE). cuv_vol Cuvette volume litres (default 0.003). eps Extinction coefficient (default 6220). enz_vol Enzyme volume millilitres (default 0.1). substr_conc Vector substrate concentrations mM. time_vec Vector reaction time points minutes. use_jitter Logical; add random noise absorbances (default TRUE). jitter_sd Numeric; SD multiplicative noise use_jitter = TRUE (default 0.02, .e. ±2% variability).
